meanings.sent1: The dark clouds in the sky gave an inauspicious start to the day.
meanings.sent2: The inauspicious weather forecast made everyone worry about their outdoor plans.
meanings.sent3: The inauspicious timing of the meeting made everyone chuckle at the coincidence.
meanings.sent4: The inauspicious beginning of the play set the tone for a dramatic performance.
meanings.sent5: The inauspicious news of the failed project spread quickly through the office.

meanings.sent1: She considered the broken mirror an inauspicious sign for the day.
meanings.sent2: The team's inauspicious start to the game put them at a disadvantage.
meanings.sent3: Finding a black cat crossing your path is often seen as inauspicious.
meanings.sent4: The inauspicious turn of events left everyone feeling uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The inauspicious lottery ticket brought disappointment instead of joy.
